message.body: I had a question about Buddhism but I have to fold laundry first!

Oh no! I'm actually heading out to Emily's house right now, but if you want to text or email it to me I would be happy to help you. I've taken two classes in the religion department related to buddhism, and really enjoyed both of them.
I'd just like to know what you know about the Two Truths of Buddhism?
Like relative and absolute? or are you wondering about the 4 noble truths?
Would you hate it if I sent you an article that explains it better than I can over text? :P I have something by Rupert Gethin that will help you out.
I've read Gethin for my class lol. I just kinda want a simple explanation in laymans terms because I'm a little confused about it
Okay! Look for an email from me in about ten minutes :)
Check your email :) I hope that makes sense!
I hope you liked gummy worms in first grade. Otherwise all points are invalid! >_^
